group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Faculty-Fulltime
group.Description: Madison College Full Time Faculty Employees

group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Faculty-Parttime
group.Description: Madison College Part Time Faculty Employees

group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Ft-Atkinson
group.Criteria: (employeeStatus = 'A') and (officeLocationCode LIKE 'CCL30%') and ((EmployeeType = 'A') or (EmployeeType = 'C') or (EmployeeType = 'E') or (EmployeeType = 'F') or (EmployeeType = 'I'))

group.Criteria: (employeeStatus = 'A') and (officeLocationCode LIKE 'CCL03%') and ((EmployeeType = 'A') or (EmployeeType = 'C') or (EmployeeType = 'E') or (EmployeeType = 'F') or (EmployeeType = 'I'))

group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Madison-Downtown
group.Criteria: (employeeStatus = 'A') and (officeLocationCode LIKE 'CCL02%') and ((EmployeeType = 'A') or (EmployeeType = 'C') or (EmployeeType = 'E') or (EmployeeType = 'F') or (EmployeeType = 'I'))

group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Portage
group.Criteria: (employeeStatus = 'A') and (officeLocationCode LIKE 'CCL15%') and ((EmployeeType = 'A') or (EmployeeType = 'C') or (EmployeeType = 'E') or (EmployeeType = 'F') or (EmployeeType = 'I'))

group.Name: MC-GS-Employees-Reedsburg
group.Criteria: ((employeeStatus = 'A') and (officeLocationCode LIKE 'CCL20%')) and ((EmployeeType = 'A') or (EmployeeType = 'C') or (EmployeeType = 'E') or (EmployeeType = 'F') or (EmployeeType = 'I'))
